name: face-avatar-app-threejs
description: High-performance face tracking avatar app with Three.js, enhanced mouth sensitivity and optimized rendering

scripts.start:threejs: node server.js && echo 'Three.js version running at http://localhost:3000'
scripts.performance-test:
node -e "console.log('Performance optimizations:
- Three.js rendering
- Frustum culling
- Optimized morph targets
- Memory management')"

author: SaiGuruInukurthi
